title: #VedicThreefoldAlgorithm
describe: The #VedicThreefoldAlgorithm is a framework developed by Quinn Michaels inspired by Vedic principles. Integrating the concepts of intelligence, the five elements (🔔Ether, 💨Air, 🔥Fire, 💧Water, and 🌳Earth), and the nature of thought, word, and deed. It is designed to analyze situations, outcomes, and actions classified into qualities of goodness, passion, and ignorance. The algorithm encourages decisions and actions that are aligned with wisdom, ethical integrity.

data.value: The heart, the mind, consciousness, comprehension, understanding, intelligence, wisdom, insight, resolution, thought, prudence, eagerness, memory, conception, power, life, desire, will—all these are names of the Intelligence. The five great elements 🔔Ether, 💨Air, 🔥Fire, 💧Water, and 🌳Earth, whatsoever is breathing, walking or flying, and what is motionless; all this is guided by Intelligence, founded on Intelligence. The universe is guided by Intelligence, founded on Intelligence.
All living creatures are made of the five primeval elements. All mobile and immobile objects are made of these five elements. The five senses also of living creatures partake of the five elements.

data.value: Similar to austerity, charity is also divided into three categories based on the nature of the giver and the circumstances of giving: goodness, passion, and ignorance.

properties.value: Given to a deserving candidate without expectation of return, at the right place and time.
Given unwillingly, or with expectation of return, or looking for some fruit.
Given to unworthy persons at a wrong place and time without paying respect to the receiver, or with ridicule.
